skillTree.name: Eye of the Gods
skillTree.description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.

skillTree.name: Aura of Chaos
skillTree.description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

skillTree.name: Bestial Scouts
skillTree.description: Ravens circle high overhead while warhounds rove far and wide, searching for hidden paths and fresh targets.

skillTree.name: Khorne’s Demand
skillTree.description: Blood, skulls, and death for the Blood God.

effects.description: Attrition suffered by defender: +50% when laying siege

skillTree.name: Rapacity
skillTree.description: Greed has its cost.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Dissever
skillTree.description: Unspeakable creativity incites ever higher levels of brutality.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Quicksilver
skillTree.description: Blink and you die.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Tormentor Sword
skillTree.description: Those that take a wound from the jagged blade of the Tormentor Sword will not only feel pain, their thoughts will be wracked with terrible omens.

skillTree.name: Enchanted Corpse Altar
skillTree.description: Wicked blessings emanate from the altar.

effects.description: Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -5

skillTree.name: Renewed Savagery
skillTree.description: Strength, strength alone...

skillTree.name: Ceaseless Stamped
skillTree.description: Any effort to stand against the servants of the the Dark Gods is meaningless.

skillTree.name: Eldritch Aegis
skillTree.description: Potency and protection.

skillTree.name: Psychopathic Bloodlust
skillTree.description: Death! Death! DEATH!

skillTree.name: Sacrificial Bloodletting
skillTree.description: Khorne demands much from those who wish to serve him.

effects.description: Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -5

skillTree.name: Wonton Viciousness
skillTree.description: Without care for body or soul, mortals fling themselves at the servants of Chaos, in a desperate, futile bid to stop the tide.

skillTree.name: Quickening
skillTree.description: The sooner the gap is closed, the sooner the bloodshed can commence.

skillTree.name: Foreboding
skillTree.description: A subtle fear gnaws at mortal hearts.

skillTree.name: Visions of the End
skillTree.description: There is no hope for the world.

skillTree.name: Immovable
skillTree.description: No enemy can cast aside a Champion of Khorne!

skillTree.name: Unsurpassed Imposition
skillTree.description: All are lesser.

skillTree.name: Supernatural Serration
skillTree.description: There is a level of crafting mastery so far beyond mortal understanding it cannot even be imagined.

skillTree.name: Punishing Blow
skillTree.description: Doom in a single strike.

skillTree.name: Galvanized
skillTree.description: Death at the hands of a servant of Khorne comes like the tendrils of lightning.

skillTree.name: Rage of Khorne
skillTree.description: Anger, rage, and fury, all made manifest, then in one fell swoop, unleashed.

ui_effects.description: ➖ 100% chance to deal 16 damage to 2 entities each per second. 960 max damage.

skillTree.name: Breath of Chaos
skillTree.description: Like a hurricane, Khorne’s furious bloodlust comes screaming from the warp.

ui_effects.description: ➕ Triggers explosion that knocks back enemies

skillTree.name: Blood Rage
skillTree.description: The fury of the Blood God is unleashed from within select champions.

skillTree.name: Gauntlet in the Warp
skillTree.description: Before you can serve you must suffer.

skillTree.name: Infusion
skillTree.description: Wild eldritch energy flows across the landscape.

skillTree.name: End of Civilisation
skillTree.description: Chaos approaches, and the weakling nations of the world are powerless in its wake.

skillTree.name: Undermined Volition
skillTree.description: Tzeentch sees all ends.

skillTree.name: Desolation
skillTree.description: An incomprehensibly barren wasteland, mutilated beyond all recognition, far as the eye can see.

effects.description: Attrition: +30% casualties suffered from Chaos territory attrition
Attrition: +60% casualties suffered from Chaos territory attrition

skillTree.name: Reincarnated Champions
skillTree.description: The veil is easily pierced.

skillTree.name: Replenish Troops
skillTree.description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 7%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 12%

skillTree.name: Spread Corruption
skillTree.description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Chaos corruption is increased by an additional 1
Spread Corruption action: Chaos corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Chaos corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Damage Walls
skillTree.description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 4% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 10% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 18% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Hinder Replenishment
skillTree.description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

skillTree.name: Power!
skillTree.description: I feel daemonic power within me!
